title: LFM - 5 - Man Silver Climb
body:
Hi all,

Looking to make/join a team and climb the rank ladders, main reason being able to coordinate team compositions and strategies easily.

I'm 19yo, currently at uni in Perth, my availabilities to play are pretty random but generally are weekday mornings and late nights past 11. My role preferences from favourite to least favourite are adc, top, support, mid and jungle. I'm current in silver 5 right now [silver 1 in season 5]. I do have ts3, skype and discord for team comms etc.

Hmu if you're interested in making a team/looking for another member.

Cheers,

Geoff
